description: Donald Trump showed Kim Jong-un a movie trailer casting both leaders as heroes. The Times’s Opinion video team cut a more honest makeover.
title: Trump Made Kim a Movie Trailer. We Made It Better.
title_page: Trump Made Kim a Movie Trailer. We Made It Better. - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Donald Trump showed Kim Jong-un a movie trailer casting both leaders as heroes. The Times’s Opinion video team cut a more honest makeover.
